'''16w39b''' is the eighth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.11]], released on September 29, 2016<ref name="blogpost_16w39a">https://www.mojang.com/2016/09/minecraft-snapshot-16w39a-the-exploration-update/</ref> to fix some bugs and crashes from [[16w39a]].

== Changes ==
'''[[Flower pot]]s'''
* Player can now remove the potted plant from the pot, by pressing {{control|use}}.

'''[[Llama]]s'''
* Drops are now affected by [[Looting]].
